ere are the extracted triplets:

<Abu'l-Wafa Tuzun
1:
--------------------
Text: Tuzun (amir al-umara):  Rising to a position of leadership in the Abbasid army, he evicted the Hamdanid Nasir al-Dawla from Baghdad and assumed the position of "amir al-umara" on 31 May 943, becoming the Caliphate's "de facto" ruler.
Triplets:<Tuzun
2:
--------------------
<Text: Tuzun (amir al-umara):  He held this position until his death in August 945, a few months before Baghdad, and the Abbasid Caliphate with it, came under the control of the Buyids.>

Triplet:<Tuzun
